scripts.build: rm -rf dist && pnpm build:client && cp package.json dist && cp pnpm-lock.yaml dist && cp index.html dist && cp .gitignore dist && touch dist/build.flag
scripts.zip: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { exec } = require('child_process'); const dir = './dist'; if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { exec('tar -czvf geo-ai-brand-visibility.zip -C ./dist .', (error, stdout, stderr) => { if (error) { console.error(`Error: ${error.message}`); return; } console.log('Project successfully zipped into geo-ai-brand-visibility.zip'); }); } else { console.error('Dist directory not found. Run build first.'); }"
